For those with trouble read the notes clearly! The 2 files !Do Not! go into the game folder, they go in a folder in your windows user profile folder that has your game save files in it.
Win7: C:-Users-(YOURUSERNAMEHERE)-Zomboid
WinXP: C:-Documents and Settings-(YOURUSERNAMEHERE)-Zomboid
And only copy the 2 files into that zomboid folder, do not create a second zomboid folder in that zomboid folder by copying the folder into the folder. When the game does not ask for a username or pw you did it correctly, any startup issues try the tips under game issues.
